page.title: 06Playing in the Band
page.content: Our band was started three years ago by two men called Brian Stephenson and Rex Spiller. The band started off with six members but now there are fifty four players. Some are from{ {Christchurch}and the rest are from{ {Ringwood. { }Every weekend in the summer season we go out to{carnivals, fetes}and{ {competitions.}Besides this we practise three times a week so the band is taking over my life. Our{uniform}is black skirt or trou- sers, a red shirt, white waist-band and red sash, white cravat, white socks and white plimsolls. The girls wear mink colour tights. The band is called the{Christchurch {and District Marching Youth Band}also known as the{Scarlet Imperials.}
